section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include:
section1.item1: Name, email address, and contact information
section1.item3: Customer loyalty program data and transaction history
section1.item4: Payment, billing, and Point of Sale (POS) transaction information

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including to process transactions, maintain your account, provide customer support, and improve user experience.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our platform, when required by law, or to protect our rights.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information. You may also object to processing of your information or request restriction of its processing.

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience on our platform and analyze usage trends.

section7.title: 7. Third-Party Services
section7.content: Our platform may integrate with third-party services. For their privacy practices, please refer to their respective sites.

section8.title: 8. Data Retention
section8.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services to you.

section9.title: 9. Children's Privacy
section9.content: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

section10.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
section10.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

section11.title: 11. Contact Us
section11.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@madna.me
